snippet.title: Dethroned Announcement Trailer - a fantasy army-building roguelike game
snippet.description:
See updated gameplay trailer here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2CJ1DyqvZOQ
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2326050/Dethroned/
Dethroned combines the best elements of strategies with the short gameplay and unpredictability of roguelikes. Choose one of the mages, develop their abilities, and look for suitable artifacts. Explore the world and gain influence. Search for new allies and manage them to reclaim the lost throne.
